properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 8:43AM PST until January 5 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...south winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt...shifting
NW 15 to 25 kt overnight. Steep seas building to 13 to 15 feet
overnight.


* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino out 10 nm, Cape
Mendocino to Pt Arena out 10 nm and Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena
10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 3 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY
